transcript.title: Algiers
transcript.content:
Today I have met with the UN Secretary General Mr Ban Ki Moon.

On behalf of the Australian people I expressed my deep condolences to hear of the tragic bombing that occurred in Algiers overnight.

My thoughts and prayers go to the families and friends of those who lost their lives, including the staff from the United Nations offices.

Australia takes a hardline on terrorism and is committed to the global fight against terrorism.

Bali

Press Office (02) 6277 7744
